Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Today we have made the tough decision to pause our ICO until February 20th, 2018. This decision was primarily driven by the feedback on the proof-of-concept model and further supported by the extremely valuable suggestions made on the Merchant Area and mobile App by advisors and team members.  By pausing the ICO, the development team can modify their scope to focus on improving our three core applications that were identified as; The Requitix Merchant Area, the Woocommerce extension and other addons as well as the new Requitix Mobile Wallet/App. The project manager and developers have committed to complete these key modifications in the next 60-days.  By modifying the team focus and applying more attention to these three components now versus after ICO, we are confident the project will sustain better long-term value for the RQX token, and provide improved stability with a solid beta of the complete Requitix solution.  Everyone that sent ETH has now been refunded, and all remain eligible for the same pre-sale bonuses, when the ICO resumes in February.  For all of you that have registered and been working on bounties, those programs will still run albeit a little longer so if you have any questions, please contact us at contact@requitix.io and weâ€™ll be able to assist more.  We will close/lock this thread and start a new one in the coming days.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: We are now locking this thread and we will create a new one for our new ANN.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Monetha doesn't provide scammer protection at all. RQX also has verified reviews as well as zero chargebacks. Plus our transaction fee is not 1.5%. It's .5%. We offer these 4 layers while they don't. Compare their features and then look at ours and you'll quickly see that Requitix is the better solution. We may not have PayPal execs on our payroll and that's a good thing. Why would you hire people from a credit card company to come work for you when that's all they know? Seems to me that hiring from PayPal would be the same old thing over again, higher transaction fees, chargebacks and no trust. That's why Requitix is the better solution. Just compare.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Yes, we're just about done with the Woocommerce extension and have already started the Drupal, Magento, Joomal addons. We have already begun development for the addons for Boonex, AdvanDate and WordPress. These will be released in the next coming weeks.  Along with that is the development of the developers API area on requitix.io which allows any ecommerce site owner to quickly register/login to the site and get their API/Java code to start protecting their site from scammers and spammers. Also with that it allows their customers who use Requitix to post a real trusted review that will be verified on the blockchain and show up on our review site.

Author: SillyCat
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: it seems a bit like the way how paypal works. basically this is like online payment system for ecommerce ?

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Yes but PayPal takes 3% of the transaction. We take .5% (Point 5 Percent). PayPal also can take your money when someone issues a chargeback. Can't do that with Requitix. PayPal also can hold your money for a while and some people have to fight to get it. Not with Requitix. Payment is instant to your wallet. PayPal also doesn't have reviews like we do. All reviews are part of the transaction on the blockchain.  We are an online processor with these 4 important components. Trusted Reviews, Scammer Protection, Zero Chargebacks and Point 5% Transaction fee.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi Cryptocoin-dv. Thanks for the question. Yes, we will have Russian along with 24 different languages in the products that get released.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: It works this way. For example, on a dating site, if the owner uses Requitix then that user is scanned through a database of known scammers. It scans for username, IP, email, photo and profile text. If that user gets flagged then the user is blocked at the IP level. That's before the user ever gets into the site. This is just a part of Requitix and doesn't have anything to do with the blockchain. It's just an added bonus for using Requitix. Now this works with any type of site. WordPress, Magento, Drupal, Joomla or any other CMS system. Again, it's just a part of what Requitix offers.  Another component is the Trusted Reviews. All too often ecommerce sites are hit with fake reviews done by their competitors. There is a whole market that allows this to happen. Sites like SiteJabber, PissedConsumer, RipoffReport all allow anyone to post an anonymous review and competitors pile on fake reviews on all these sites. The review site owners won't remove them so they just don't care about the merchant. It's all about them. Well that stops with Requitix. Merchants that user Requitix will be able to let their customers create a review of the transaction. If someone pays with Requitix then there is a 30 day window they have to leave a review of the transaction. They can only leave one review. That review then shows up on reviews.requitix.io and it's verifiable due to the transaction being on the blockchain so there's no way to fake it.  Hope that helps.

Author: johnnywoo2015
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Thank you for your answer. It helps.  Somehow I don't like it.  "It scans for username, IP, email, photo and profile text" it's too much personal info and the one Big Data DB. Also, most people are using dynamic IPs nowadays.  But I will follow the project.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi. Thanks for the reply. It doesn't just scan the IP. It scans the IP, username, Email, Photo and text within any text box area. While we can't go into direct specifics of how it works I can say that it's adaptive and constantly updating and changing to catch these types of people.  If we can protect the consumer and the merchant with scammer/spammer protection how is that not a win for them? Add in the trusted reviews component and it makes the system even more valuable. When it comes to reviews every online merchant has been hit with fake reviews about their site. There's a whole industry setup to profit off of fake reviews. With our system fake reviews will not exist. Consumers are only allowed to review the transaction they just completed and only one time. Once it's  reviewed it shows up on reviews.requitix.io.  If you're a merchant that sells products/services online then you're going to like it. There's no downside. Even the transaction fee is a hit. Most pay 3%. Requitix merchants will pay point 5%. Not even one whole percent.  Again, thanks for the reply and if you want to know more please ask.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Yes and we think Requitix is a great product and will solve some very serious issues in the ecommerce world. Thank you for your comment!

Author: poordeveloper
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Since I assume for many people on dating sites the privacy will probably be very important, how do you ensure the privacy of the clients?

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Dating sites or any ecommerce site that uses Requitix would already have that level of privacy. Since Requitix is a token, all details are done via transaction id's so there is no record to anyone's name. It's anonymous in that sense. Even reviews are anonymous because they play into the complete transaction from buyer to seller. Only trans ids are used on the review site.

Author: poordeveloper
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: That should also help improve the ability to sell the payment method. It's way more anonymous than cards, safer for clients and allows the client to check for merchant trustworthiness.

Author: stasyk411
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Tokens for a dating site? Do you seriously think that they are needed there? Or did I not understand something?

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi stasyk411, thanks for the reply but let me clarify it. It's not just a token for a dating site. It's a whole ecommerce solution. We are using dating because that's our industry and it made complete sense to start it in this space for the simple fact that two of our four components are a huge issue in the dating world. Trusted Reviews and Scammers and Spammers. Our proof of concept in dating just worked for us to launch out of.  What makes us different than others is we offer 4 components: Trusted Reviews, Scammer/Spammer protection, Zero Chargebacks and .5% transaction fee (Free for 6 months for first 250 merchants). It works with Woocommerce, Drupal, Magento, Joomla and others. We are also integrating it with Boonex.com, AdvanDate.com and a hose of other software projects. Dating is a small space compared to the overall ecommerce world that we will be penetrating.  Hope that clarifies your question. Be sure to read our whitepaper as well as visit www.requitix.io  Thanks again for your question.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi, over the last 15 years we have compiled a very large database of known scammer usernames, emails, ip addresses, photos and profile text. Each visitor that registers or visits a site that uses Requitix will be scanned through this database and if found will be immediately banned. If a visitor is not listed in the db but shows any sign of being a scammer or spammer then they will be banned. Our database is very large and more records are added to it each day. These come from different sources including partner sites. That's just a small part of it. We can't really go into detail how how it all really works but you get the gist.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Requitix Announces Early Merchant Sign-up Incentive and Date: Today, Requitix has announced a significant advantage for the first 250 Merchants that register to accept RQX tokens for regular transactions. Throughout the entire beta period and up through the initial release of the payment gateway system, all early adopters of the Requitix merchant solution will have Zero (0%) processing fees for the first six months of use with the official production release of the Requitix solution.  All merchant transactions using the RQX token as payment will see zero merchant transaction fees during the first six months of official usage, and still have the protections and value of the entire Requitix system, including scammer/spammer protections, qualified reviews, and of course, zero chargebacks.  Full merchant registration will open on January 1st, 2018 so be sure to secure your spot by visiting the Requitix Merchant Registration page.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: First off, love that username. This is a very important topic. As many ecommerce site owners will tell you, unscrupulous competitors have been known to create fake reviews attempting to smear or destroy their online reputation. This is a tactic done by some very large organizations as well, and happens to just about any ecommerce site out there.  Site owners are people too â€“ And discovering false, misleading or negative information about them feels unjust and can cause a horrible feeling inside.  When any anonymous person out there can purposefully destroy someone's online business, it becomes a chilling fact of Internet business that must be addressed, and with the Requitix Confidence System, we help alleviate and solve those worries.  How? â€“ By having a system that only allows your true customers to post reviews.    The system works like this; When a customer pays with Requitix, they will have 30 days to create a review about the product or service. This review is only allowed when a transaction is created on the blockchain. The customer can post one review per their transaction. Once the review is posted, the transaction is available on our review site. Site owners can send potential customers to the review site to confirm real reviews from real customers.  Merchants can now have confidence in a genuine review system that also benefits consumers by allowing them to make informed buying decision, based on legitimate reviews.

Author: Lipe490
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: This project looks like JDS (Justing Dating Site). I really enjoy seeing new projects for the social medias.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi CjMapope, do know that using words like "scam" is a very serious allegation and one we won't take lightly.  I have to differ with you on the social profiles. While Twitter is new our team LinkedIn profiles are not. Most of our team has been in the dating industry for over 17 years. Our main proof of concept site was created in 2002.  Also, we have big names in the dating business as advisors on our team. Marc Lesnick runs the largest internet dating conference in the world and is well known in the dating business and his conference brings in names like Match.com, eHarmony.com, Flirt.com, Microsoft, Google, OKCupid and a host of other big name dating sites. Michael Carter owns the largest niche market dating sites (263 sites). Andrew Boon owns Boonex.com, the largest social community software provider in the world. Bogdan Fiedur is the cofounder and CTO of bitjob.io.  All the links on requitix.io work just fine.  So, as you can see our team is real and diverse and I would hope that you would refrain from using words like "scam" unless you have actual proof/facts to back up the claim.

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi Lipe490,  Requitix is nothing like JDS. They are a dating platform to connect people. We are a payment gateway solution built to deal with trust, scammers/spammers, zero chargebacks and low transaction fees. While we're launching in the dating space, since it's in our partners roots, our objective is a global ecommerce payment solution. That's how we're different.  Be sure to read our whitepaper at requitix.io  Thank you for your comment and I look forward to hearing more questions.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: If I understand it correctly, this will help authenticate users on dating websites, correct?  I think you guys are on to something big here. What cryptocurrencies will you accept for investments?

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi Poordeveloper,  The RQX system will scan all users before they complete any registration on any participating site. If they are flagged due to having an IP, Username, Email, Photo or profile text in the database then that user is blocked at the IP level. If they are not in the database and show signs up potential scammers then they are blogged and the site owner is notified to take a second look at this user. This is part of our stop the scammers/spammers product.  It's also not just for dating sites. It will serve any ecommerce merchant equally well from WordPress, Drupal, Magento, Joomla and others.  We are only taking Ethereum during our crowdsale. Thanks again for your question.

Some banks charge outrageous amounts per chargeback. I've even seen $50. This on top of losing the sale money and the client...  How is the 0.5% paid? Does the client need to send more money or is it taken from the merchant's payout?

Author: requitix
Title: [ANN] [ICO] REQUITIX - Trusted Token & Confidence System for Dating and Beyond.
Body: Hi Retired, good question. The .5% transaction is taken off the total transaction at transaction time. The API handles that. For example. If a customer is paying a merchant 40 RQX for an item then the merchant would receive 39.8 RQX and .2 RQX would go to Requitix.  Thanks for the question.
